llm_responses:
- I was in Medbay with Bob, Charlie, and Erin.  We were all doing tasks.
- Bob seemed to finish his scan pretty quickly. Anyone else see him elsewhere?
- Charlie and Erin were on diagnostics for a while.  Seems legit.
Bob and I were together in Electrical, so he couldn't have been in Medbay.

- So, three against one, huh? Seems like you all coordinated your stories pretty well.
- It's interesting how you all claim to have seen me kill Bob, yet none of you mentioned it before I reported the body.  Wouldn't you have called an emergency meeting immediately if you'd witnessed a murder?
- Alice, you say you saw me in Cafeteria. Did you see anyone else there with me?  Anyone who can corroborate that I was there for a while, doing the trash task?
- If I was truly trying to kill someone in Medbay, wouldn't I have vented out immediately instead of reporting the body and sticking around?  That seems pretty counterintuitive for an impostor, don't you think?
- Look, I get it, it's easy to gang up on someone.  But ask yourselves, is it more likely that I'm lying, or that three of you are working together to get me ejected?
So, all three of you conveniently saw me kill Bob, but none of you thought to call a meeting until *after* I reported the body?

- It seems like you've all decided I'm the impostor.  Is there anything I can even say to change your minds at this point? *sounds defeated*
- Maybe I'm misremembering. Things happened so fast. Were any of you near Navigation around that time?  Trying to retrace my steps...
- This whole thing feels like a setup.  Why would three people wait to report a body?  What were you doing during that time?
This is clearly a coordinated effort to frame me; how is it possible three people happened to be in Medbay at the same time I was?

- Why would I report the body if I killed Bob?  Wouldn't that just draw attention to me?  It makes no sense.
- It seems awfully convenient that three of you were *all* together in Medbay. Were you watching each other do tasks?
- Alice, you say you saw me in Cafeteria. Did you see anyone else there with me?  Maybe someone can back up *my* story.
- I'm not changing my story. I was doing trash in Cafeteria, then went to Electrical, *then* to Medbay.  It takes time to move between rooms.
Isn't it strange that none of you reported the body immediately if you *actually* saw me kill Bob?

- So, Alice, you're saying you saw me in Cafeteria, then went all the way to Weapons, and *then* somehow knew to come back to Medbay to corroborate Charlie and Erin's story?  Seems awfully convenient.
- It's interesting how none of you mentioned seeing me kill Bob until *after* I reported the body.  Almost like you needed time to concoct this elaborate lie.
- If three of you were watching Bob scan, wouldn't one of you have screamed or reacted immediately when I supposedly killed him? Why the delayed reaction?
- This whole thing feels incredibly orchestrated.  Three witnesses, all with perfectly aligned stories?  It just doesn't add up.  I'm starting to think you three are working together.
So, three of you just *happened* to be in Medbay at the same time, witnessing my "crime," while Alice conveniently saw me elsewhere – seems awfully orchestrated, don't you think?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I can absolutely confirm that I saw Dave kill Bob in Medbay while he was doing the scan task, and Dave is lying about being in Electrical with him.
Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: I can confirm that Dave is lying because I personally saw Bob, Charlie, and Erin go from Cafeteria to Medbay, plus I witnessed Dave doing trash in Cafeteria during that same time, so he definitely wasn't in Electrical like he claims.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: So, all three of you conveniently saw me kill Bob, but none of you thought to call a meeting until *after* I reported the body?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: I understand your skepticism Dave, but the reason for the delayed report doesn't change the fact that three of us witnessed you murder Bob in Medbay while he was scanning, and your story about being in Electrical completely contradicts Alice seeing you in Cafeteria at that time.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: The evidence is overwhelming - we have three witnesses who can place Dave in different locations that contradict his Electrical story, and both Charlie and I directly saw him kill Bob during the scan in Medbay.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Given that I saw Dave doing trash in Cafeteria at the exact time he claims to have been in Electrical with Bob, and we have two direct witnesses to the murder in Medbay, I think we have more than enough evidence to vote Dave out.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: This is clearly a coordinated effort to frame me; how is it possible three people happened to be in Medbay at the same time I was?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Dave, your story has changed multiple times - first claiming to be in Electrical, then Cafeteria for trash, and now questioning our presence in Medbay, but the simple truth is we all moved there from Cafeteria in sequence to watch Bob's scan.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: The sequence of events is crystal clear - we all moved from Cafeteria to Medbay in a logical order, which Alice witnessed, and your changing stories about being in Electrical versus Cafeteria only further prove your guilt, Dave.
Discussion: [System]: You have 3 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Dave's constantly shifting story about his location - from Electrical to Cafeteria to questioning our presence in Medbay - combined with two direct witnesses to Bob's murder and my own observation of him in Cafeteria, makes it absolutely clear that he's the impostor.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Isn't it strange that none of you reported the body immediately if you *actually* saw me kill Bob?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: The timing of the body report is irrelevant compared to the fact that we have multiple witnesses who saw you kill Bob in Medbay, and your story has changed from being in Electrical to being in Cafeteria, which completely undermines your credibility.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: The timing of the body report is a minor detail compared to the fact that we have three credible witnesses - Alice who saw you in Cafeteria contradicting your Electrical story, and both Charlie and myself who directly witnessed you kill Bob during his scan in Medbay.

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: So, three of you just *happened* to be in Medbay at the same time, witnessing my "crime," while Alice conveniently saw me elsewhere – seems awfully orchestrated, don't you think?

chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Dave's focus on the body report timing is just a distraction from the fact that Alice saw him in Cafeteria when he claimed to be in Electrical, and both Charlie and I witnessed him kill Bob during the scan task in Medbay.
